name: Fruit Frenzy: The Tiny Collector
description:
Hello o/ This is my very first time using Unity and creating a game on it.

Welcome to Fruit Frenzy: The Tiny Collector. Play as a little pink character walking around the world they have spawned in. Collect as many melons as you can and beware of the spoopy traps. Try and reach the end to collect your trophy full of yummy fruits.

Credit to:

- Coding in Flow's Playlist (Build a 2D Platform Game in Unity | Unity Beginner Tutorial)

Assets used for this project:

- Pixel Adventure 1

- 8Bit Music - 062022

- FREE Casual Game SFX Pack
